text: Even chance of both positive and negative events
[[b]]Sanity[[/b]] can only be gained through Commander Lu's presence and certain events.
[[b]]Sanity[[/b]] can loss only through certain events.
• Sanity causes an event to play every Harvest season, giving a random effect along with an event.
• Events can be positive or negative and will either cause a gain or a drop in Sanity.
• Positive events are more likely to appear at high Sanity.
• Negative and potentially game altering events are more likely at low Sanity.
• Put your trust in Commander Lu.
